SYSTEM: 4._methodologies-Espec-OL.pdf: Página 22
Ontological Engineering 
©Asunción Gómez-Pérez,
Ontology Specification. Intended Uses
Objective: To obtain which are the main intented
uses for the ontology, that is, in which kind of 
scenarios the ontology will be used. 
Output: The “Intended Uses” slot in the ORSD 
template.
Recommended Techniques: Interviewers (in the 
same 
place 
or 
virtual 
using 
internet/phone 
facilities) with users and domain experts.
Recommended Tools: ¿?
